title: An ‘Army’ of Volunteer Sleuths Are Out Hunting for Your Stolen Car
description: In Portland, vehicle thefts have soared, and the police say they are focused on other crimes. Now victims are helping each other track down their own cars.
dc:creator: Mike Baker
media:credit: Justin Katigbak for The New York Times
media:description: Titan Crawford has led a growing network of volunteer sleuths who scour Portland’s streets, alleys and forests, racing against time in hopes of finding stolen vehicles before they end up shredded for parts.
